subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets had already exercised their $16 million option on David Wright, a six-time All-Star, for 2013. The new deal replaces that option year and will run through 2020.
snippet: The Mets had already exercised their $16 million option on David Wright, a six-time All-Star, for 2013. The new deal replaces that option year and will run through 2020.
